author: Staff Reporter
text: Professor Ronald C. Petersen of Mayo Clinic, a world expert on brain ageing and memory loss, will deliver the 36th TS Srinivasan Oration, organised by NIMHANS, Bengaluru, and NEUROKRISH, Chennai, on February 14, here. The subject of the oration is ‘The Forgetful Brain.’ Healthcare professionals and those interested in attending the session may contact 24353079/24357194 or info@marundeshwara.com
title: Talk on ‘The Forgetful Brain’
